Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp

this package contains AMP-specific NiReports files (the Schema definition and the upper-level classes needed to make it work)

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmpDifferentialColumn<K extends Cell>
    an AMP column which keeps a keyed cache of a column indexed by activity_id in a DifferentialCache, subject to invalidation on db changes or a timeout.
    AmpFiltersConverter
    the AMP filtering rules, used jointly by AmpReportsSchema and HardcodedReportsTestSchema
    AmpFundingColumn
    the NiReportColumn which fetches funding cells.
    AmpNiReportsFormatter
    part of the (NiReportsCore, AmpReportsSchema, Reports API) intersection - formats the output according to the AMP-specific rules.
    AmpPrecisionSetting
    the precision setting used by AMP.
    AmpReportsSchema
    the big, glorious, immaculate, AMP NiReports schema.
    AmpReportsScratchpad
    the AMP-schema-specific scratchpad
    In short: each NiReportsEngine instance running a report has an AmpReportsScratchpad counterpart instance.
    AmpSqlSourcedColumn<K extends Cell>
    a column which fetches its input from a view, row-by-row, filtered by mainId The way a row is interpreted as a Cell is left for the subclasses to define (see AmpSqlSourcedColumn.extractCell(NiReportsEngine, ResultSet))
    AmpTrivialMeasure
    a straightforward NiTransactionMeasure which converts AMP-specific configuration info into Ni-generic predicates
    DateColumn
    a differentially-fetched column which generates DateCell cells All the extra columns are ignored
    DirectedMeasureBehaviour
    the Behavior of a Funding Flow entity.
    DoubleColumn  
    ForecastExecutionRateBehaviour
    the Forecast Execution Rate behaviour
    ForecastExecutionRateMeasure
    the forecast execution rate measure
    MtefBehaviour
    the Behavior of a non-Funding-Flow MTEF column
    MtefColumn
    class for fetching any of the MTEF columns/measures.
    NiReportsGenerator
    the Reports API entry point for NiReports, used for generating & formatting a report and also logging reports runtime (if configured through NiReportsGenerator.logReport)
    NormalizedPercentagesColumn
    a column which fetches items with percentages from a view with a "nonNulls" column and associated PercentagesCorrector instance.
    OutputSettings
    Stores custom output settings and information
    PercentagesCorrector
    a corrector for null percentages and denormalized percentages sums.
    PercentagesCorrector.Snapshot
    a PercentagesCorrector snapshot containing data for the denormal entities only
    PercentageTextColumn
    a text column which fetches its input from a normalized view (sum of percentages over an entity id = 100, no nulls, else the output will be denormalized) which contains 4 or more columns:
    amp_activity_id (or pledge_id) payload (text) entity_id (e.g.
    PidTextualTokenBehaviour
    empty text cells, by the default text cell behaviour, are just "" for Project Implementation Delay, the requirement was to explicitely put '0' for empty cells.
    PPCColumn
    class for fetching PPC columns.
    PsqlSourcedColumn<K extends Cell>
    a SqlSourcedColumn which uses AMP's PostgreSQL infrastructure as a source of data
    SelectedYearBlock
    passive structure holding data regarding the selected year and its timestamps
    SimpleTextColumn
    a simple text column which fetches its input from a view which contains 3 or more columns:
    1.
    SqlSourcedNiDimension
    a NiDimension which fetches its data from an SQL SELECT statement
    SubDimensions
    This class holds all columns that can be used as hierarchies are at sub activity level.
    TaggedMeasure
    a trivial measure which splits itself according to the string Meta values stored in a meta of the cells
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AmpReportsSchema.NamedElemType
    used for filters (to retrieve names for summary sheet in excel report)
    MetaCategory
    category keys which can be found in the AmpReportsSchema metaInfo

Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp Description

this package contains AMP-specific NiReports files (the Schema definition and the upper-level classes needed to make it work)
